about_me.des: I am a web engineer with website development experience. Life is a continuous learning process, so work makes me more rigorous.Maybe this world is not beautiful, but it is worth fighting for

projects.tidyWebsite: Tidy website's presentation and business presentation.
projects.wandabox: Wandabox providing customers with smart laundry.
projects.tidyWebApp: This is a web application that uses SUI, the backstage uses php, realizes the interaction, provides the customer to wash and to purchase the flower business.
projects.monthLottery: MonthLottery provides users with a draw.

career.nextcode_des: Now I am in Nextcode and develop website with Python code for genetic analysis.
career.netease_des: In Netease game, I learned game service system and use Python code for ops.
career.ucloud_des: In ucloud, I started to deal with servers and Linux system and use shell scripts to manage massive server.
career.college_des: At July 2013,I graduated from college and started my IT technology tour.
